mapper.select: SELECT CATEGORY_NO , CATEGORY_NAME , STATUS FROM CATEGORY WHERE STATUS LIKE 'Y' ORDER BY CATEGORY_NO
SELECT PRICE_NO , PRICE_MIN , PRICE_MAX FROM PRICE ORDER BY PRICE_MIN
SELECT TYPE_NO , REF_CATEGORY_NO , TYPE_NAME , STATUS FROM TYPE WHERE REF_CATEGORY_NO LIKE #{categoryNo}

SELECT B.BRAND_NO , B.BRAND_NAME , B.STATUS, COUNT(P.PRODUCT_NO) QUANTITY FROM BRAND B JOIN MODEL M ON(M.REF_BRAND_NO = B.BRAND_NO) JOIN PRODUCT P ON(P.REF_MODEL_NO = M.MODEL_NO) JOIN TYPE T ON(P.REF_TYPE_NO = T.TYPE_NO) WHERE B.BRAND_NO LIKE #{typeNo} AND B.STATUS LIKE 'Y' AND M.STATUS LIKE 'Y' AND P.STATUS LIKE 'Y' AND T.STATUS LIKE 'Y' GROUP BY BRAND_NO , BRAND_NAME , B.STATUS ORDER BY QUANTITY DESC

SELECT M.MODEL_NO , M.MODEL_NAME , M.STATUS , COUNT(P.PRODUCT_NO) QUANTITY FROM MODEL M JOIN PRODUCT P ON(P.REF_MODEL_NO = M.MODEL_NO) JOIN BRAND B ON(B.BRAND_NO = M.REF_BRAND_NO) WHERE B.BRAND_NO LIKE #{brandNo} AND M.STATUS LIKE 'Y' AND P.STATUS LIKE 'Y' AND B.STATUS LIKE 'Y' GROUP BY M.MODEL_NO , M.MODEL_NAME , M.STATUS ORDER BY QUANTITY DESC
